content.title: Websites built with strategy, copy and tracking
content.subtitle: Different industries. Same method: goals first, then structure, content and measurement.
content.body: These are real projects for real businesses — each built with the same approach: understand the goal, write clear copy, build solid foundations, and set up tracking.

items.title: Villa Luzzago
items.description: Hotel and resort website with clear structure, booking-oriented flow and strong brand presence across multiple properties (villa, restaurant, events venue). Built to communicate the experience and convert visits into direct bookings.

items.title: Audiofonetica
items.description: Service-focused website for a healthcare provider. Trust-building structure with clear service descriptions, professional positioning and conversion paths. Designed to reassure, explain and generate enquiries.

items.title: Picchi Machines
items.description: B2B website for an industrial machinery company. Complex products explained simply, with structured service pages, clear navigation and lead generation focus. Built to make technical offerings accessible to buyers.
